root.BusinessItemHeadingNumbered: Licensing Hours Extensions Bill: Remaining Stages

MotionText.from_cdata: Not amended in Public Bill Committee, to be considered.

from_cdata.p: If proceedings on this Bill end before 2.30pm, the second Bill and, possibly, subsequent Bills may be debated in the time remaining. After 2.30pm, only Bills which are unopposed may make further progress.

root.BusinessItemHeadingNumbered: Pensions (Special Rules for End of Life) Bill: Remaining Stages

MotionText.from_cdata: Not amended in Public Bill Committee, to be considered.

from_cdata.p: For amendments, see separate paper (also available on the publications webpage for the Bill).

p.span: The Northern Ireland Assembly has approved a Legislative Consent Resolution relating to this Bill. Copies of the Resolution are available in the Vote Office (also available on the documents webpage for the Bill).
